vote.title: Authorize funding for one year between the City of Dallas with Austin Street Center in the amount of $548,440.00, Bridge Steps in the amount of $560,000.00 and CitySquare in the amount of $391,560.00 for FY 2022-23, for access to homeless recovery services for the Office of Homeless Solutions - Total not to exceed $1,500,000.00 - Financing: General Fund
vote.description: Authorize funding for one year between the City of Dallas with Austin Street Center in the amount of $548,440.00, Bridge Steps in the amount of $560,000.00 and CitySquare in the amount of $391,560.00 for FY 2022-23, for access to homeless recovery services for the Office of Homeless Solutions - Total not to exceed $1,500,000.00 - Financing: General Fund
